resources.string:
Are your sure you want to disable the QuickLock?
Version:0.0.1
Developer:Seven
EMail:yihongyuelan@gmail.com
Copyright 2013 Seven
"If you'd like to UNINSTALL this app, please uncheck this app in:\nSetting > Location and Security > Select device adminstrators > Uncheck \"QuickLock\""
QuickLock is an app which can help you quickly lock your phone without press the power button.

If QuickLock has not been activated, you will be guided to activate after this note.\nAfter activating, you can lock your phone and turn off screen quickly, when you click the QuickLock icon on your phone.

Please follow the steps below:
1.Uncheck this app in Device adminstrators:
Setting > Location and Security > Select device adminstrators then Uncheck "QuickLock""
2.Find the QuickLock in:
Setting > Manage apps, then choose uninstall.
QuickLock need device management authority, please activate before using.\nIt won\'t do any harm to your device. We are free and open source.\nActivated Now?
Create a shortcut on the desktop
